## Set up the packages needed for creating a package.

```{r packagesetupchunk}
install.packages("devtools") # install package "devtools"
library("devtools") # load devtools
devtools::install_github("klutometis/roxygen") # install "roxygen" from github
library(roxygen2) # load roxygen2
```
